name: Demon Hero
description:
A very evil Hero lived there.
And a good Demon king lived there too.
One day, the evil Hero decided to become a demon king.
So Hero decide to remove the good Demon king and Demon king’s friends.

Have you been curious about the Demon Hero game?

It is A normal clicker game.

But, The Demon Hero is different from other games!

A low-level clicker game! Childish Game Story!
Boring gameplay! Annoying game balance! Many game ads!

You really can not believe it?

Then, please play the game directly!
